articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Sheikh Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, on April 22.
					 The message reads:
					
					 It gives me pleasure to send my heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency on your election as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, would like to appreciate the good relations between our two friendly countries and affirm our common determination to develop the ties in conformity with the wellbeing and interests of the two countries.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact headed by its President Li Zhaoxing laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 Members of the delegation paid tribute to the statues after laying a floral basket. 
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Mongolian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Mongolian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to DPRK, at Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Ri Yong Hwan, secretary of the Central Committee of the league, returned home on May 7 from China after taking part in the events to mark the 90th founding anniversary of the Communist Youth League of China and the 93rd anniversary of May 4 Movement.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Praise Rosy Future of DPRK
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Praise Rosy Future of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The heads of the delegations of the Korean medical workers abroad which took part in the 14th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad expressed their will to remain loyal to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Kim Tae Sik, head of the delegation of Korean medical workers in Japan, said: Last year the Korean nation lost its fatherly leader Kim Jong Il so suddenly. This was like a bolt from the blue for us Koreans who have lived, entrusting both destiny and future to him. We suffered indescribable pain over the loss. But we drew enormous strength and courage while staying in the homeland. Because we witnessed the reality of the homeland led by Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 I was struck with irrepressible admiration for his personality as a great man.
					
					 I will do my best to remain loyal to his cause.
					
					 Pak Mun Jae, head of the delegation of Korean medical workers in the U.S., said the homeland has a rosy future, indeed, adding:
					
					 I was greatly excited to listen to the speech Kim Jong Un made at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 His speech gave the Koreans abroad great encouragement and confidence.
					
					 All the countrymen will advance dynamically in response to his call "Forward toward the Final Victory!"
					
					 Being loyal to Kim Jong Un is the most vivid expression of patriotism for us.
					
					 The Korean medical workers overseas will make positive efforts to contribute to the development of medical science and technology and the improvement of health of the Koreans. 
					
					 We will bear Kim Jong Il's noble idea of love for the country, the nation and people deep in our minds and contribute to the prosperity of the country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Unhasu Concert for May Day Continues
articles.content:
Unhasu Concert for May Day Continues
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The concert "Family of the General" given by the Unhasu Orchestra to mark May Day is underway everyday with splendor at the People's Theater amid great acclamation by the audience.
					 Enjoying it were officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians of units including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory. Also among the audience were officers and men of the Korean People's Army and journalists.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including mixed sextet and chorus "May, Month of Victory", chorus "Endless Yearning", male duet "This Honor of Raftsmen Is Boundless", female solo and chorus "We Will Follow with Single Mind" and chorus "Let Us Meet at the Front".
					
					 The performers sang in praises of the longing for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the joy and optimism of the working people who have performed feats in the drive for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The concert continues.

articles.title: White Chinaware Exhibition in Pyongyang
articles.content:
White Chinaware Exhibition in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of white chinaware with cobalt-blue-color-drawings has been opened at the Korean Central History Museum.
					 According to Song Thae Ho at the research center of the museum, the exhibition consists of three parts -- "Early days of white chinaware derived from traditional ceramic craftsmanship", "Heyday of white chinaware characteristic of drawings and formative arts" and "Korea's white chinaware smelling of national features".
					
					 On display at the exhibition are nearly 50 items of porcelains, 14 of which were considered to be national treasures, including "flower, bird-patterned quadrangular-shaped bottle" and "dragon, cloud-patterned jar".
					
					 The white chinaware began to come into being in the end of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392) and developed in 15-17th centuries.
					
					 The chinaware saw a heyday of development in 18th and 19th centuries, with drawings represented by realistic contents, not mysterious.
					
					 Among the exhibits is a distribution chart of chinaware kiln site at that time. 
					
					 The exhibition will run until the end of May.

articles.title: Stamps Issued in DPRK to Mark 30th Olympiad in London
articles.content:
Stamps Issued in DPRK to Mark 30th Olympiad in London
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued four kinds of stamps in commemoration of the 30th Olympic Games in London.
					 Displayed in the upper part of each stamp are Korean and English letters reading "Games of the XXX Olympiad London 2012" and pictures of DPRK flag, the Olympic flag and emblem of the Olympiad.
					
					 Depicted in the stamps are players of athletics, judo, gymnastics and swimming.
					
					 The Olympiad will take place in London from July 27 to August 12 this year.
					
					 The DPRK has been qualified for such events of the forthcoming Olympiad as women's football, weightlifting, marathon, wrestling, table-tennis, archery, shooting, judo and diving.

articles.title: Two Sets of Triplets Born in DPRK
articles.content:
Two Sets of Triplets Born in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Two sets of triplets were born in the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital of the DPRK on May 3.
					 Ji Yon Hui, wife of army officer Jang Kyong Nam, residing in Kosong County of Kangwon Province, gave birth to girl triplets in the morning.
					
					 She received a rest cure for nearly 100 days after being hospitalized late in January. 
					
					 The hospital provided her with the best medical care including treatment for ensuring the babies' normal growth and preventing complication. 
					
					 Her babies weigh 1.98, 2.15 and 1.78 kgs at birth.
					
					 Kim Yong Sim, farmer of the Munhung Co-op Farm in Phyongwon County of South Phyongan Province, gave birth to one boy triplet and two girl triplets in the afternoon.
					
					 Her husband Ri Myong Gwon is also a farmer of the same farm.
					
					 The weights of Kim's were 1.83, 2.09(boy) and the last-born 1.87 kgs at birth.
					
					 The babies are in good health.

articles.title: New-type Trolley Bus Manufactured in DPRK
articles.content:
New-type Trolley Bus Manufactured in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A new-type Chollima trolley bus has been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The trolley bus is based on a magnetic switching motor and control system.  
					
					 Its boarding capacity is 2.5 times the existing non-linked one and 1.4 times the linked one.
					
					 It is capable of carrying 170 to 180 passengers on an average.
					
					 It economizes more than 40 percent electricity compared with the previous ones and costs low in operation.
					
					 Its maker is the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory.
					
					 The DPRK manufactured the first trolley bus in 1961.
					
					 An opening ceremony for tramline of trolley buses took place in the plaza of the Pyongyang Railway Station on the eve of the May Day in 1962.
					
					 The buses began running in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province in 1970 to be followed by other local cities.

articles.title: New Popular Dances Created
articles.content:
New Popular Dances Created
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- New popular dances have been created the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 People learning the dances are seen everywhere in the country.
					
					 The new dances are made up of kicking, clapping and shoulder moving and slow or quick waltz. They are danced to the tune of folk songs and such current popular songs as "My Wife" and "At a Go". Their movements are highly vibrant and cheerful, with their rhythms easily understandable.
					
					 The new dances can be danced in any spots without making a circle.
					
					 Kim Hye Yong, a worker at the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, told KCNA that the dances' movements are so animated that she is interested in learning them.
					
					 "I feel as if I am in the 20s while on the dances," she said.
					
					 Yun Sang Hum, a choreographer of the Korean Dance Institute, said he would work hard to popularize the new dances in order to instill optimism in the minds of the local people in their efforts for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The dances were created by the Korean Dance Institute under the Phibada Opera Troupe.

articles.title: KCNA on Celebration of Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
KCNA on Celebration of Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency issued a detailed report on Monday on the DPRK's celebration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 According to the report, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the centenary of the President's birth as the greatest holiday in the nation's history.
					
					 The events held to mark the Day of the Sun demonstrated before the whole world the tremendous might and invincibility of Songun Korea where they formed a harmonious whole with the great leaders.
					
					 There took place the fourth Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. They clearly showed the firm will of the WPK, the service personnel and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages. 
					
					 The statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing on Mansu Hill were unveiled with splendor in the presence of Kim Jong Un and the mosaics depicting the smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected on Jangdae Hill as a monument to the immortality of the leaders.
					
					 Mangyongdae where Kim Il Sung was born was successfully spruced up as the place dear to the Korean people and the world progressives. 
					
					 A national meeting and a military parade were significantly held to celebrate the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung in the presence of Kim Jong Un and the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army was opened to visitors.
					
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade deeply touched the whole nation and the rest of the world.
					
					 Celebration meetings took place in all provinces, cities (districts), counties and complexes and firework galas in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sinuiju and other cities.
					
					 Order of Kim Il Sung was awarded to Kim Jong Il, commemorative coins were issued and 100 volumes of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", a library of the Juche idea, and other books dealing with their personality as great men published on the same occasion.
					
					 The letters "Comrade Kim Il Sung, Our Eternal Leader" were carved on a rock near the Pakyon Falls in Kaesong City while mosaics portraying the three commanders of Mt. Paektu erected in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province. 
					
					 Colorful events took place in Pyongyang and localities to celebrate the 100th Day of the Sun such as Kimilsungia Festival, national photo exhibition, national book exhibition, oratorical meeting and Korean stamp exhibition.
					
					 The Unhasu Orchestra gave a performance on the occasion of the opening of the People's Theatre which was built as a gift of leader Kim Jong Il to the Korean people greeting the 100th Day of the Sun and a grand performance celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung was given at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 Remembrance meetings and art performances of working people's organizations, school youth and children and kindergarteners across the country were held. A national meeting of joint organizations of the Korean Children's Union took place here. 
					
					 The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Festival and other sports events took place and evening galas of youths and students, mass gymnastic displays and the April Holiday Food Festival were held in Pyongyang and local areas, adding to the festive mood. 
					
					 Labor gifts were presented on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					
					 The Huichon Power Station went operational and the Tanchon Port was completed. 
					
					 The second-phase project for the reclamation of the Kwaksan Tideland and the Nampho-Pyongyang sea water pipeline were completed. The Taekwon-Do Complex with its Korean-style gabled roof was successfully built in Chongchun Street of Pyongyang. 
					
					 The 618 Cement Factory, Hwangbong Mine and many other objects were built on a modern basis and went operational. Production processes for improving the standard of people's living have been newly established at many factories. 
					
					 There appeared skyscrapers in the Mansudae area of the capital city and Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop and Mirae Shop were built on the bank of the River Pothong. 
					
					 The Kangsong Health Complex to be proud of in the world sprang up in a local machine plant.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Its Wild Ambition for Reinvasion
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Its Wild Ambition for Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Japan's moves to unilaterally mark the sea between Korea and Japan as the "Sea of Japan" were checked at a recent meeting of the International Hydrographic Organization (IHO).
					 The meeting turned down both the proposal for voting for the unilateral designation of the above-said sea as the "Sea of Japan" and the proposal for modifying the designation according to the separately marked sea in the international hydrographic chart.
					
					 It was quite natural that Japan's brigandish call for unilaterally marking the sea was turned down by the international community.
					
					 Japan's claim that the East Sea of Korea should be marked as the "Sea of Japan" is a revelation of its undisguised ambition for militarist reinvasion as it is a shameless distortion of history in utter disregard of principles of historicism and objective facts.
					
					 The East Sea has always been part of the inviolable territorial waters of the Korean nation.
					
					 Its ancestors who created a history spanning 5 000 years explored the East Sea of Korea and named it "Korean Sea", "East Sea of Korea" from ancient times much earlier than the time when a country named "Japan" appeared on its archipelago.
					
					 This is clearly registered in historical documents of Korea including "Samguksagi (Chronicles of the Three Kingdoms)" and engraved on the monument at the Mausoleum of King Kwanggaetho erected in 414.
					
					 Ancient documents and maps published by foreign explorers and geographers described the East Sea as "Korean Sea", "East Sea of Korea."
					
					 Newly discovered in Japan prior to the meeting was a map drawn by a European explorer and cartographer and printed in 1646. This map also marks the sea claimed by Japan as "Korean Sea". 
					
					 As a lot of old maps published in Japan and Europe show, the marking of the "Sea of Japan" denotes waters east of Honshu, Shikoku and Kyushu of Japan, in other words, waters towards the Pacific, east of Japanese archipelago only.
					
					 Marking the East Sea of Korea as the "Sea of Japan" was a product of the Japanese imperialists' policy of colonial rule over Korea in the last century.
					
					 After occupying Korea by force of arms, the Japanese imperialists registered Korean sea as the "Sea of Japan" in the IHO in 1929 by taking advantage of its position as a suzerain state, paving the way for unreasonably marking the sea in the international hydrographic chart.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' aggression against Korea was illegal and all premises for brigandish designation of the "Sea of Japan" were removed along with their defeat. Therefore, the said designation should have been abrogated at that time.
					
					 Japan's above-said claim is no more than sheer sophism in the light of the present international practice and principles governing the marking of the sea.
					
					 It is international practice to mark a sea according to its geographical situation with a continent as a standard and designate a sea according to the names of the peninsula and the country on it in case of the sea between a peninsula and islands.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries are persistently insisting on the designation of the "Sea of Japan." This is prompted by their ulterior design to justify the hideous crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists in Korea in the last century, stage a comeback to Korea and, for the present, grab the East Sea of Korea and Tok Islets in its territorial waters.
					
					 Japan's pronounced assertion for the designation of the "Sea of Japan" and moves to seizure Tok Islets are calling back the departed soul of the Japanese imperialists, robbers.
					
					 Japan's bid to repeat the Japanese imperialists' blood-stained history of aggression which brought so horrible disasters and misfortune to the peoples in Korea and other Asian countries is bound to go bust in face of bitterer rebuff and denunciation by all Koreans and the international community.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Group of Working Hard to Create Distrust in DPRK's Social System
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Group of Working Hard to Create Distrust in DPRK's Social System
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime's moves to create distrust in the socialist system in the DPRK comes under fire by a bylined article of Rodong Sinmun Monday. 
					 The rat-like Lee group is becoming desperate in its moves to dare do harm to the dignified social system in the DPRK, the mainstay of the single-minded unity, the strongest one in the world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached an unpredictable worst phase due to the Lee group's undisguised vicious moves to escalate confrontation of social systems.
					
					 The traitorous "unification of social systems" is the essence of the Lee group's confrontation policy.
					
					 The "unification" touted by the puppet forces is the criminal "unification of social systems" which presupposes doing harm to the ideology and social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The frantic confrontation racket kicked up by the Lee group during the celebrations of the Day of the Sun in the DPRK was part of its scenario to realize its wild ambition for the "unification of the social systems" and its climax.
					
					 The puppet forces are seized with such extreme fear that south Korea may be swallowed up, far from achieving "unification through absorption." They are, therefore, becoming evermore desperate in their moves to hurt the single-minded unity in the DPRK come what may in a bid to boost their tattered policy against the nation.
					
					 For these forces to try to hurt someone through the racket for confrontation of the social systems is as foolish an act as trying to eclipse the sun with a palm.
					
					 The Lee group can never escape the deadly strikes of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to take a thousand-fold revenge upon it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Group's Ridiculous Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Group's Ridiculous Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Thae Hyo, senior presidential secretary for foreign strategy planning of Chongwadae, was reported to have toured New York and Washington recently for huddles with high-ranking diplomatic and security officials of the U.S. over what they called "proposal for cooperation in the policy towards the north." 
					 Officials of the defense ministry held the first south Korea-U.S. "joint defense consultative meeting" in the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes in a bylined article in this regard: 
					
					 A series of anti-DPRK huddles held by south Korean officials with their U.S. master are nothing but a revelation of the serious uneasiness about their deepening crisis and extreme confrontation hysteria.
					
					 The criminal confabs are further escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "cooperation with the U.S. in the policy toward the north" touted by the puppet group is nothing but dangerous cooperation aimed at infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and ratcheting up the sanctions against the DPRK worldwide.
					
					 "The strong counter-action" cried out by them for coping with "threat of the north's nukes and missiles" and the like is no more than an adventurous drumbeat to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in league with foreign forces and, furthermore, ignite a war against the north, finding fault with its exercise of right to sovereignty.
					
					 The puppet forces are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can seek a way out and bring down the DPRK, backed by their U.S. master. 
					
					 No matter how earnestly the Lee Myung Bak group may beg foreign forces for protection and cooperation, clamoring for "nuclear umbrella" and "missile shield," they can never prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 The group would be well advised to stop going reckless, clearly mindful that its thoughtless behavior counting on foreign forces would bring it to nowhere.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Air Forces Kick off Largest-ever Air Drill Targeted against North
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Air Forces Kick off Largest-ever Air Drill Targeted against North
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. 7th Air Force and the south Korean puppet air force Monday kicked off the largest-ever joint air drill across south Korea, according to CBS. 
					 The south Korean Air Force Operation Command disclosed this. 
					
					 The drill which will last till May 18 will reportedly focus on "precision strikes at someone's bases for provocations." 
					
					 The ceaseless saber-rattling against the north by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and south Korean warmongers is rendering the situation the Korean Peninsula extremely tense.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Retract Their Scenario for War against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Retract Their Scenario for War against North
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on May 4 made public a statement denouncing the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak for having put their theory of preemptive attack on the DPRK into a concrete war scenario. 
					 The statement recalled that a high-ranking official of the "government" said south Korea has worked out an operational plan for reducing the north into ashes by preemptive attack on it, blustering that it should strike the north in advance "once there is a sign of the north's nuclear attack." 
					
					 This indicates that the authorities have put the theory of preemptive attack into a specific operational plan, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The operation plan is a dangerous one to start an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula as it is meant for escalating a war. 
					
					 Lurking behind the authorities' disclosure of the plan for aggression against the backdrop of the daily aggravating situation is an intention to totally block the process for peace on the peninsula till the end of the tenure of their office. 
					
					 The statement urged the authorities to immediately withdraw the scenario for aggression which would bring the second Korean War.

articles.title: Fascist Authorities' Inhuman Treatment of Woman under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fascist Authorities' Inhuman Treatment of Woman under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- 17 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Chungbuk Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law" held a press conference on May 4 at which they condemned the "government" authorities' inhuman treatment of a woman writer.
					 The organizations in their press release chided the fascist authorities for indicting and detaining a woman writer on charges of violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that she conducted cultural and literary activities in Chungju. 
					
					 The woman writer who has been behind bars for nearly a month is mother of a little daughter with no one to look after, the press release noted, adding that the daughter is now in distress, pitifully calling her mother. 
					
					 It demanded the security authorities immediately stop their inhumane treatment and release the woman writer.
					
					 They will never tolerate the tyrannical suppression by the traitors' regime and security authorities, it declared.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Remarks on Jeju Naval Base Construction
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Remarks on Jeju Naval Base Construction
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea in a commentary on May 3 denounced Park Geun Hye for letting loose reckless remarks in a bid to bring again the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula, blinded with her ambition to strengthen the alliance for aggression with the U.S.
					 The commentary accused Park of asserting on May 1 that it is necessary to turn Jeju Island into a recreation resort while protecting security through the construction of a naval base.
					
					 What she uttered is just the same as the call for letting the U.S. nuclear-powered carrier flotilla which has been operating with the East Sea of Korea as a center anchor at Jeju Island so that it may put the West Sea of Korea under its control, it noted, adding:
					
					 This would result in increasing tensions in Northeast Asia, far from ensuring peace.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is little different from Lee Myung Bak who drove peace and the inter-Korean relations to collapse as she was a main player in railroading the country-selling and humiliating south Korea-U.S. FTA through the "National Assembly."
					
					 It criticized Park for putting peace and people's living at greater peril through tightened alliance with the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Russia
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Russian papers and Internet homepages dedicated articles to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung with a portrait of the smiling President and photos showing his revolutionary activities.
					 Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on April 14 said that the Korean people were looking back on the devoted services made by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building an independent and sovereign state in Korea and firmly protecting the dignity of the country and the nation on the centenary of the birth of the President (the Day of the Sun).
					
					 The April issue of Russian paper Serp I Molot referred in detail to the undying feats performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the world revolution since he embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years.
					
					 The paper noted that the Korean people have dynamically pushed forward the building of a thriving socialist nation, firmly sticking to the line and policy of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Sverdlovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on April 13 and 14 posted on its Internet homepage articles on the revolutionary career of the President under the captions "The centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung" and "Congratulations to the Korean people on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung."
					
					 Internet homepage Pravda. Ru on April 16 said that the world attention focused on the DPRK significantly celebrating the centenary of the President's birth. It posted an article contributed by a personage of the Far Eastern Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences praising the personality of the President as a great man.

articles.title: Feats of Peerlessly Great Men of DPRK Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Feats of Peerlessly Great Men of DPRK Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign participants in the World Congress on the Juche Idea in their speeches lauded the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, noted that the President's was the career of the great leader who devoted his all to the sacred cause for the freedom and liberation of the people.
					
					 The President was the most prominent leader who led the revolution and construction to victory through his rare ideological and theoretical activities and wise leadership, the chairman said, adding that he clearly indicated the road to be followed by the world people desirous of independence.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, said that the President dedicated himself to the people all his life, adding that his feats always shine.
					
					 Thomas Losh, chief of Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, said that Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea, Songun idea fathered by the President.
					
					 The chief said that works of Kim Jong Il were being published and disseminated worldwide and Juche idea study groups were formed in many countries.
					
					 Javed Ansari, secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, noted that Kim Jong Il gave scientific answers to the issues of achieving victory in the anti-imperialist struggle in the present times, adding that the great feats of the peerlessly great men would shine forever.

articles.title: Army Day of DPRK Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
Army Day of DPRK Observed in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in different countries from April 20 to 27 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 A meeting was held in Cuba, a get-together in Poland, reading session and film show in Ethiopia and film shows in Guinea and Russia.
					
					 A vice-minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba who is member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba noted that the founding of the KPA marked a new landmark in the history of the Korean people and the world revolutionary movement, adding that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK developed into invincible armed forces capable of defeating any formidable enemy at a single blow.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for Preserving the Tradition of the Polish People's Army noted that President Kim Il Sung was a genuine popular statesman and outstanding strategist dedicated to the founding and strengthening of the powerful revolutionary armed forces capable of firmly guaranteeing the security of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The chairman said that rosy is the future of Korea as Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is further bolstering up the KPA into powerful revolutionary armed forces, carrying forward the causes of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The deputy manager of the water project designing and supervising enterprise in Ethiopia noted that Kimilsungia is an immortal flower which came into bloom thanks to the boundless reverence of the world progressives for the President, adding that the flower will blossom in Ethiopia and all other parts of the world.
					
					 The commander of the Kindia detached unit of commando force of Guinea noted that the KPA founded by the President is demonstrating its might as a matchless and invincible army thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, stressing that no force on earth can match the KPA in the aspects of politics and ideology and military technique.
					
					 DPRK films shown included "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: KPA's Birthday Observed in Guinea, Kuwait
articles.content:
KPA's Birthday Observed in Guinea, Kuwait
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Guinea and Kuwait carried special write-ups interwoven with articles on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Guinean newspaper Horoya on April 24 carried a special write-up titled the " KPA, Mainstay for Socialist Cause" illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un acknowledging the salute of military paraders.
					
					 The paper said: Kim Jong Il attached primary attention to firmly preparing the KPA ideologically and politically. As a result, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have grown strong in idea and faith as they are intensely loyal to their leader and are ready to dedicate themselves to the struggle for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The KPA plays the role of soldiers on outpost duties making a breakthrough in bringing about a leap forward and advance in socialist construction.
					
					 Kuwaiti newspaper Al-Rai on April 25 in an article titled the "DPRK where Songun idea was founded" noted that the Songun idea is founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il.  This idea is being steadfastly carried forward by General Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade clearly proves that the ideas and line of the President and the leader have been steadfastly carried forward and the history of Songun is given steady continuity in the DPRK, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Egyptian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Egyptian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya on May 1 carried the detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, says that it is the principled requirement for victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The work indicates tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Juche Idea Praised in Nepal
articles.content:
Juche Idea Praised in Nepal
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, contributed an article titled "Juche idea praised by the whole world" to the  Nepalese Newspaper Arpan on April 27.
					 The immortal Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung is praised by the whole world and it has become a great idea guiding global independence, the writer noted, explaining in detail the philosophical principle and essence of the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea serves as a great idea sympathized and praised by the world because it indicates the way of achieving independence by giving lucid answers to all the questions arising in the era, the writer said, and went on:
					
					 People can always win victory only when they advance the revolution and construction by their own efforts, believing in their strength as masters of the revolution and construction. This is a profound philosophical conception clarified by the Juche idea.
					
					 The Korean people live under the socialist system independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence as they are guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 The World Congress on the Juche Idea held in Pyongyang to celebrate the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung proved once again the validity and great vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the army and people of the DPRK, is the great leader of the world progressive people including the people of Nepal.
					
					 The DPRK wisely led by him will turn into a more developed and prosperous country.

articles.title: Afghans Protest against NATO Forces' Killing of Civilians
articles.content:
Afghans Protest against NATO Forces' Killing of Civilians
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A protest demonstration was launched in Laghman Province of Afghanistan on May 1 against the NATO forces' killing of civilians.
					 Hundreds of Afghans took part in the demonstration to denounce the NATO forces for killing 2 innocent civilians at a recently launched raid.
					
					 The demonstrators blocked the major highways and strongly condemned the atrocities of NATO forces.

articles.title: Two NATO Soldiers Killed in S. Afghanistan
articles.content:
Two NATO Soldiers Killed in S. Afghanistan
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Two NATO soldiers were killed Friday in an insurgent attack in southern Afghanistan, the military alliance confirmed in a press release issued there.

articles.title: Anti-Israel Demonstration in Jordan
articles.content:
Anti-Israel Demonstration in Jordan
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Dozens of Jordanian demonstrators on Thursday called for the release of Jordanian prisoners in Israeli jails.
					 The demonstrators said their move was in solidarity with the Jordanian prisoners who started a hunger strike recently in the Israel jails.
					
					 The demonstrators urged the Jordanian government to intervene and impose pressure on the Israelis to release the prisoners.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza "declaracion conjunta" del Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza "declaracion conjunta" del Consejo de Seguridad
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC en cuanto a que los paises miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU publicaron una "declaracion conjunta" acusando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del MINREX de la RPDC dio el dia 6 la siguiente respuesta:
					Los paises miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, participantes ahora en la primera reunion preparativa para la conferencia de revision del TNP de 2015 sesionada en Viena de Austria, publicaron la llamada "declaracion conjunta" cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de la RPDC y exigiendo a esta suspender las actividades nucleares y renunciar el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Este grave acto ilegal viola, en adhesion a la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, la soberania de esta y su derecho de usar el espacio y la energia nuclear con fines pacificos.
					
					La gravedad del problema descansa en que los miembros permanentes repiten unilateralmente lo que dicta como bandido EE.UU. en desprecio al principio de accion simultanea estipulado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre haciendo vista gorda, como gesto de parcialidad, de los crimenes de ese imperio que causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana mediante su incesante amenaza y chantaje nucleares y politica hostil.
					
					Ellos son precisamente los que realizaron mucho mas que otros las pruebas nucleares y tienen tambien la mayor cantidad de armas nucleares. 
					
					Ellos no tienen ni el derecho moral a cuestionar el problema nuclear de otros porque siguen manteniendo peligrosos arsenales nucleares suficientes para exterminar centenares de veces a la humanidad entera. Sin embargo, partiendo de su abominable logica de bandido, estan acusando a la RPDC, victima que sufre mas directa y largamente la amenaza de guerra nuclear.
					
					Salieron con tal sofisma a la mesa de debate de la revision del TNP para perpetuar su monopolio de armas nucleares y eludir su compromiso al desarme nuclear al distraer la atencion de los participantes en la reunion.
					
					Para evitar que otros paises se retiren mas del TNP, las potencias nucleares deben respetar el derecho de todos los paises al uso de energia nuclear con fines pacificos conforme a la mision principal del TNP, y dejar de recurrir a la elocuencia o al engano en cuanto al compromiso al desarme nuclear.
					
					Ya paso la era en que EE.UU. amenazaba a nuestro pais con bombas atomicas.
					
					Defenderemos con firmeza la soberania nacional e impulsaremos energicamente la explotacion del cosmos con fines pacificos y el desarrollo de la industria de energia nuclear, basandonos en el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo, para construir un Estado prospero en que el pueblo disfrute de riqueza y prosperidad bajo el regimen socialista.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador mongol
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador mongol
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio el dia 7 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador de Mongolia en Corea, Manibadrakh Ganbold. 
					Luego, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam realizara visita oficial a Indonesia y Singapur
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam realizara visita oficial a Indonesia y Singapur
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, realizara pronto una visita oficial de amistad a la Republica de Indonesia cumplimentando la invitacion del presidente indonesio Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono.
					Kim visitara tambien la Republica de Singapur.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim dirige central hidroelectrica y mina carbonifera
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim dirige central hidroelectrica y mina carbonifera
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, dirigio el dia 5 en el mismo terreno la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin Kumyagang y la Mina Carbonifera Juventud de Kumya.
					Ante todo, el premier recorrio varios lugares de la central y convoco una reunion consultiva. 
					
					En la ocasion se tomaron las medidas para aumentar la produccion de electricidad mediante el pleno funcionamiento de los equipos generadores y para que las unidades concernientes suministren los equipos y materiales necesarios a la gestion de la  planta. 
					
					Luego, el premier averiguo en el terreno las labores de la Mina Carbonifera Juventud de Kumya. 
					
					Despues de hacer conocimiento detallado de la produccion de carbon, realizo una reunion consultiva de los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					En la ocasion se tomaron las medidas para atender bien la vida de los obreros, en pleno acato al noble amor por el pueblo del Maximo Dirigente           Kim Jong Un, y producir y suministrar suficientemente el carbon necesario en varios dominios de la economia nacional.

articles.title: ACNC comenta frustrado intento de Japon en cuanto al Mar Este de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta frustrado intento de Japon en cuanto al Mar Este de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- En la reciente asamblea general de la Organizacion Internacional Hidrografica, quedaron frustradas las tentativas de Japon de anotar exclusivamente el Mar Este de Corea como "Mar de Japon".
					Ha sido desaprobada tambien su iniciativa de elaborar un proyecto de enmienda en base al atlas de rutas maritimas internacionales en que el Mar Este de Corea aparece con el unico nombre de "Mar de Japon".
					
					Tal insistencia de Japon viola el principio historicista y tergiversa cinicamente los hechos historicos demostrando su cada dia mas abierta ambicion militarista de retomar el camino de agresion.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, el Mar Este de Corea sigue siendo el sagrado de la nacion coreana.
					
					Los antecesores coreanos, forjadores de su larga historia de 5 milenios, descubrieron el Mar Este de Corea ya en la edad antigua, o sea, mucho antes de que se fundara Japon en el archipielago japones. 
					
					Ellos fueron precursores tambien en denominarlo como "Mar de Corea" y "Mar Este de Corea".
					
					Esta verdad esta registrada clara y patentemente en los libros historicos de Corea, inclusive "Historia de los Tres Reinos", y en la lapida del Mausoleo del rey Kwanggaetho construido en el ano 414.
					
					Tambien en los libros y mapas antiguos publicados por los expedicionarios y geografos de otros paises el mar en cuestion es anotado como "Mar de Corea" y "Mar Este de Corea".
					
					Sucede lo mismo en el mapa dibujado en 1646 por un expedicionario y cartografo europeo, el cual ha sido descubierto nuevamente en Japon en visperas de la reunion arriba mencionada.
					
					Como se ve en numerosos mapas antiguos hechos en Japon y Europa, la denominacion de "Mar de Japon" indica solo el mar al este de Honshu, Shikoku y Kyushu, es decir, la parte del Mar Pacifico al este del archipielago japones.
					
					Esa denominacion es producto de la politica colonial y de ocupacion de Corea que practicaron los imperialistas japoneses en el siglo pasado. 
					
					Tras ocupar militarmente a Corea, ellos registraron el polemico mar como "Mar de Japon" en la Organizacion Internacional Hidrografica  aprovechando su posicion de metropoli.
					
					Desde entonces, comenzo la historia de esa anotacion injusta en el atlas de rutas maritimas internacionales.
					
					La misma agresion de Japon a Corea fue ilegal y esa anotacion debio ser cancelada ya al momento de la derrota del pais isleno en la segunda guerra mundial.
					
					La opinion de Japon es injusta tambien si se tiene en cuenta las costumbres internacionales, segun las cuales el nombre de un mar se fija a base del nombre de la tierra firme cercana a su posicion geografica.
					
					Ademas, en el caso de un mar entre una peninsula y una isla, su nombre se anota con el nombre del pais que tenga soberania sobre esa peninsula.
					
					A pesar de esto, los reaccionarios japoneses insisten obstinadamente en su anotacion partiendo de su siniestro intento de justificar sus tremendos crimenes cometidos en Corea en el siglo pasado, realizar la ambicion de reagredirla y por inmediato, arrebatar el Mar Este de Corea y el islote Tok.
					
					Lo que hacen ellos esta resucitando el fantasma del imperialismo japones.
					
					La reproduccion de la historia de agresiones del imperialismo japones, que impuso enormes desgracias y sufrimientos a los pueblos de Corea y Asia, sera repudiada y condenada cada vez mas fuerte por toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana conflictiva anti-RPDC de Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana conflictiva anti-RPDC de Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun condena las campanas de la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak de crear la desconfianza sobre el regimen socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La banda ratonesca de Lee actua con frenesi para descomponer el digno regimen y la firme unidad monolitica de la RPDC, dice asi el articulo y continua:
					
					Debido al cada dia mas abierto alboroto de confrontacion de regimenes de la banda ratonesca de Lee, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en el peor estado imprevisible.
					
					La esencia de la politica conflictiva de la banda de Lee es la antinacional "unificacion de regimenes".
					
					La "unificacion" de que habla la banda titere surcoreana es "la unificacion de regimenes" tomando como premisa el derrocamiento de la idea y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Las freneticas campanas conflictivas cometidos por la banda de Lee Myung Bak antes y despues de los actos en celebracion del Dia del Sol son la prolongacion y el climax de intencion de realizar la "unificacion de regimenes" de caracter antinacional
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos por el temor de que su regimen pueda ser absorbido por completo en vez de realizar la "reunificacion mediante la absorcion", actuan mas freneticamente para mantener su fracasada politica traidora deshonrando la unidad monolitica de la RPDC.
					
					Es la vana ilusion que ellos intentan atentar a alguien con el alboroto de confrontacion de regimenes.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak no puede liberarse jamas del blanco de venganza del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
